com.sizzo.something.data
类 SizzoTransaction

java.lang.Object
  com.sizzo.something.data.SizzoTransaction

public class SizzoTransaction
extends Object

A transaction for interacting with a Contacts provider. This is used to pass state around throughout the operations comprising the transaction, including which databases the overall transaction is involved in, and whether the operation being performed is a batch operation.

构造方法摘要
SizzoTransaction(boolean batch)
          Creates a new transaction object, optionally marked as a batch transaction.
 
方法摘要
 void finish(boolean callerIsBatch)
          Completes the transaction, ending the DB transactions for all associated databases.

构造方法详细信息

SizzoTransaction

public SizzoTransaction(boolean batch)
Creates a new transaction object, optionally marked as a batch transaction.

参数：
batch - Whether the transaction is in batch mode.
方法详细信息

isBatch

public boolean isBatch()

isDirty

public boolean isDirty()

markDirty

public void markDirty()

markYieldFailed

public void markYieldFailed()

startTransactionForDb

public void startTransactionForDb(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                                  String tag,
                                  android.database.sqlite.SQLiteTransactionListener listener)
If the given database has not already been enlisted in this transaction, adds it to our list of affected databases and starts a transaction on it. If we already have the given database in this transaction, this is a no-op.

参数：
db - The database to start a transaction on, if necessary.
tag - A constant that can be used to retrieve the DB instance in this transaction.
listener - A transaction listener to attach to this transaction. May be null.

hasDbInTransaction

public boolean hasDbInTransaction(String tag)
Returns whether DB corresponding to the given tag is currently enlisted in this transaction.

getDbForTag

public android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase getDbForTag(String tag)
Retrieves the database enlisted in the transaction corresponding to the given tag.

参数：
tag - The tag of the database to look up.
返回：
The database corresponding to the tag, or null if no database with that tag has been enlisted in this transaction.

removeDbForTag

public android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase removeDbForTag(String tag)
Removes the database corresponding to the given tag from this transaction. It is now the caller's responsibility to do whatever needs to happen with this database - it is no longer a part of this transaction.

参数：
tag - The tag of the database to remove.
返回：
The database corresponding to the tag, or null if no database with that tag has been enlisted in this transaction.

markSuccessful

public void markSuccessful(boolean callerIsBatch)
Marks all active DB transactions as successful.

参数：
callerIsBatch - Whether this is being performed in the context of a batch operation. If it is not, and the transaction is marked as batch, this call is a no-op.

finish

public void finish(boolean callerIsBatch)
Completes the transaction, ending the DB transactions for all associated databases.

参数：
callerIsBatch - Whether this is being performed in the context of a batch operation. If it is not, and the transaction is marked as batch, this call is a no-op.
